response.hook: The GitReader narrator orchestrates the narration of code symbols, enhancing understanding through vivid contextual insights.

key_lines.text: narration, source, model = _generate_narration(node, snippet, context, mode)

response.next_thread: Consider exploring the _generate_narration function for deeper insights into narrative generation.
summary: This module defines functions to narrate code symbols.
It utilizes caching for efficiency and integrates with an external API for generating narratives.
Key functions include narrate_symbol and load_cached_narration.
